item.title: Feb_24_2025
item.description:
ğŸ“† 24 Feb 2025 - Status Report

ğŸ›  Accomplishments

  • Successfully developed the model and endpoints for posting review survey responses at /api/survey/response.
  • Created endpoints for retrieving survey responses (getSurveyResponse) and survey response statistics (getSurveyResponseStats), including robust validations.
  • Contributed to the design of the “create survey” form in the front-end, enhancing user experience.
  • Added a crucial “type” field to the review widget settings, improving flexibility.

âš ï¸ Challenges Faced

  • Faced significant challenges in designing an efficient response model schema.
  • The newly developed API endpoints remain untested due to the absence of a corresponding front-end.

ğŸ¯ Goals for Tomorrow

  • Conduct thorough testing of the getSurveyResponse, postSurveyResponse, and getSurveyStats API endpoints.
  • Battle test the API endpoints to ensure their stability and performance under load.
  • Contribute to the design of the “create survey” form, focusing on features like email sending and link generation.

ğŸ“– Project Highlights

ğŸ“¡ API Development

  • Expanded the API’s capabilities by implementing endpoints for survey response management.
  • Focused on ensuring data integrity and reliability through comprehensive validations.

ğŸ¨ Frontend Collaboration

  • Actively participated in the design process of the “create survey” form, contributing valuable insights.
  • Enhanced the review widget settings by adding a “type” field, improving customization options.

ğŸ§ª Testing and Validation

  • Prepared to conduct rigorous testing of the newly developed API endpoints.
  • Emphasized the importance of battle testing to ensure the API’s robustness.

ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack Used

  • Backend APIs: Node.js (Express)
  • Database: MongoDB (Schema Design)
  • Frontend: Design collaboration
  • Testing: (Planned) Unit testing, Integration testing

ğŸš€ Whatâ€™s Next?

âœ… Complete the testing of the API endpoints, including edge cases and performance testing. âœ… Finalize the design of the “create survey” form, with a focus on email and link generation. âœ… Begin implementation of the front-end components for survey response submission.

item.title: Feb_21_2025
item.description:
ğŸ“† 21 Feb 2025 - Status Report

ğŸ›  Accomplishments

  • Developed and deployed production-ready middleware using Joi for comprehensive validation of the Survey API in the Dashboard API.
  • Completed validation for POST (new survey) and PUT (update survey), covering all data edge cases.
  • Engaged in a crucial discussion with Sheetal Ma’am regarding the strategy for handling survey responses, with finalization pending frontend testing.
  • Created detailed documentation in Markdown for the Survey API.

âš ï¸ Challenges Faced

  • Determining the optimal approach for storing, processing, and managing customer survey responses.
  • Resolved a small bug encountered during middleware implementation with the assistance of Amit sir.

ğŸ¯ Goals for Tomorrow

  • Design a robust structure for review survey responses to meet all client requirements for survey creation and response flow.
  • Conduct a thorough discussion with Sheetal Ma’am, Amit sir, and Chandra sir to finalize the response structure.

ğŸ“– Project Highlights

ğŸ›¡ï¸ API Validation Middleware

  • Implemented Joi-based middleware to ensure data integrity and prevent errors in the Survey API.
  • Covered all edge cases in validation for POST and PUT requests, enhancing API reliability.

ğŸ¤ Collaborative Discussions

  • Participated in discussions with team members to strategize the handling of survey responses.
  • Emphasized the importance of aligning backend design with frontend requirements.

ğŸ“ API Documentation

  • Created comprehensive documentation in Markdown to facilitate API usage and maintenance.
  • Ensured the documentation is clear, concise, and up-to-date.

ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack Used

  • Backend APIs: Node.js (Express)
  • Validation: Joi
  • Documentation: Markdown
  • Collaboration: Team discussions, code reviews

ğŸš€ Whatâ€™s Next?

âœ… Finalize the structure for review survey responses after thorough discussions with the team. âœ… Begin implementation of the response handling logic. âœ… Conduct further testing and refinement of the Survey API.

item.title: Feb_20_2025
item.description:
ğŸ“† 20 Feb 2025 - Status Report

ğŸ›  Accomplishments

  • Successfully implemented GET, PUT, and POST methods for the /api/surveys endpoint, enhancing the survey management capabilities.
  • Added the average rating field to the review model, providing more comprehensive data for analysis.

âš ï¸ Challenges Faced

  • Conditional Question Logic: While the core logic for conditional questions is in place, robust error handling and validation are needed to ensure previous_question_id references valid questions within the same survey. Clearer documentation is also required.
  • Performance Optimization: The addition of conditional logic and population might impact the performance of GET endpoints (/api/survey/:id and /api/surveys), particularly for surveys with numerous questions.

ğŸ¯ Goals for Tomorrow

  • Enhance the conditional question logic with robust validation and error handling, and improve documentation.
  • Investigate and implement performance optimizations for GET endpoints to address potential bottlenecks.
  • Begin comprehensive testing of API endpoints, including edge cases and conditional question flows.

ğŸ“– Project Highlights

ğŸ“¡ API Enhancements

  • Expanded the functionality of the Survey API by implementing essential CRUD operations.
  • Focused on improving data consistency and reliability by adding the average rating field.

ğŸ§© Conditional Question Logic

  • Implemented the foundation for conditional questions, allowing for more dynamic and tailored surveys.
  • Identified the need for robust validation and documentation to ensure seamless implementation.

ğŸš€ Performance Considerations

  • Recognized the potential impact of new features on API performance.
  • Proactively planning to address performance bottlenecks through indexing and other optimizations.

ğŸ›  Tech Stack Used

  • Backend APIs: Node.js (Express)
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Testing: (Planned) Unit testing, Integration testing

ğŸš€ Whatâ€™s Next?

âœ… Complete the implementation of robust validation and error handling for conditional questions. âœ… Perform detailed performance analysis and implement necessary optimizations. âœ… Conduct thorough testing to ensure the API’s stability and reliability.

item.title: Feb_19_2025
item.description:
ğŸ“† 19 Feb 2025 - Status Report

ğŸ›  Accomplishments

  • Engaged in a detailed discussion with Sheetal Ma’am regarding the survey model and its practical implementation.
  • Made a significant contribution by developing a new API endpoint at /api/survey for the dashboard.

âš ï¸ Challenges Faced

  • Faced hurdles in designing an efficient schema for the survey model and the related review question model.
  • Encountered complexities while developing the basic controller for the new API endpoint.

ğŸ¯ Goals for Tomorrow

  • Strive to make the /api/survey endpoint production-ready.
  • Focus on refining the schema to ensure it can scale effectively, with guidance from Sheetal Ma’am.

ğŸ“– Project Highlights

ğŸ“ Survey Model Development

  • Deep-dived into the intricacies of designing a robust survey model.
  • Collaborated to ensure the model aligns with the project’s requirements and user needs.

ğŸ“¡ API Endpoint Creation

  • Successfully created a new API endpoint, adding crucial functionality to the dashboard.
  • Focused on ensuring the endpoint’s reliability and performance.

ğŸ›  Tech Stack Used

  • Backend APIs: Node.js (Express)
  • Database: MongoDB (Schema Design)
  • Collaboration: Team discussions, code reviews

ğŸš€ Whatâ€™s Next?

âœ… Thoroughly test the /api/survey endpoint for production readiness. âœ… Optimize and refine the database schema for better scalability. âœ… Document the API endpoint and schema for future reference.
